rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 5 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 11:53 AM, 08 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Zambales, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Rizal, Batangas, Laguna and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bataan(Morong, Hermosa, Orani, Abucay, Samal, Bagac, Balanga), Pampanga(Arayat, Lubao) and Nueva Ecija(Cabiao, San Isidro) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
